page.title: 14Recent history of L./Heath.
page.content: Following the establishment of a thriving{market garden industry},the area quickly developed.Soon,factories, roads,churches,schools,railway lines, and other amenities grew up to serve the new community. In{1880}the jam factory was built by {Louis Lynn and Co .}In 1886,{St.John's {Mission}was built and this was turned into a school eight years later.In the same year(1894){St.John's Church}was finished.In{1902}, a congregational church,a pub (The Sir Joseph Paxton), and a Post Office were built. So, by the turn of the century,the area had many amenities to offer its growing population. The twentieth century has seen the emergence of a variety of new industries which have encouraged a still greater influx of people.
